summary: Duplicate name error occurs when @temporalio/worker and @temporalio/testing are both installed, causing a protobufjs namespace conflict with the ActivityHeartbeat type in the coresdk namespace.
userImpact: Users cannot use @temporalio/testing with @temporalio/worker due to protobuf namespace conflicts preventing tests from running.
rootCause: Different versions of @temporalio/proto in worker and testing packages contain duplicate protobuf definitions that conflict when loaded simultaneously.
proposedFix: Ensure all @temporalio/* packages use the same version
workaround: Use matching versions across all @temporalio packages
resolutionDetails: User confirmed that using the same version of all @temporalio packages resolved the duplicate name error.
keyQuote: Please use the same version of of the `@temporalio/*` packages, it should prevent this from happening.
